name: The Chronicles of Riddick
description: The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

review.author: Marshall-D-Teach
review.heading: Riddick
review.reviewBody: Riddick might not be the right character to build an epic saga story line about, but he's the right character to make a franchise with and this film proves that Vin Diesel's Riddick role is fun enough to watch with great action set pieces.

keywords: night vision,fugitive,shared universe,actor reprises previous role,epic sci fi
